typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		O_ORDERKEY as integer,
		O_CUSTKEY as integer,
		O_ORDERSTATUS as boolean,
		O_TOTALPRICE as string,
		O_ORDERDATE as string,
		O_ORDERPRIORITY as string,
		O_CLERK as string,
		O_SHIPPRIORITY as boolean,
		O_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderPart1
source(output(
		R_REGIONKEY as string,
		R_NAME as string,
		R_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderPart2
source(output(
		R_REGIONKEY as string,
		R_NAME as string,
		R_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderPart3
source(output(
		R_REGIONKEY as string,
		R_NAME as string,
		R_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderPart4
source(output(
		R_REGIONKEY as string,
		R_NAME as string,
		R_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderPart5
source(output(
		R_REGIONKEY as string,
		R_NAME as string,
		R_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderPart6
source(output(
		R_REGIONKEY as string,
		R_NAME as string,
		R_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrderPart7
OrderPart1 derive(totalprice = replace(O_TOTALPRICE, ',', '.'),
		orderdate = toDate(O_ORDERDATE, 'dd.MM.yy')) ~> DerivedColumn1
OrderPart2 derive(totalprice = replace(O_TOTALPRICE, ',', '.'),
		orderdate = toDate(O_ORDERDATE, 'dd.MM.yy')) ~> DerivedColumn2
OrderPart3 derive(totalprice = replace(O_TOTALPRICE, ',', '.'),
		orderdate = toDate(O_ORDERDATE, 'dd.MM.yy')) ~> DerivedColumn3
OrderPart4 derive(totalprice = replace(O_TOTALPRICE, ',', '.'),
		orderdate = toDate(O_ORDERDATE, 'dd.MM.yy')) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
DerivedColumn3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
